name: 2012 - 2SCS14 Order NOW!
description:
2SCS14 LIFES SHORT GO BIG
 
<st>Old Man Winter Slams the Mountains of British Columbia, Canada blanketing the terrain with the deepest snow Frontier Films cameras have ever seen.</st> 
This Adventure Snowmobile Film takes the viewers into the famed Steep and Deep of Revelstoke, BC and then to the endless riding zones surrounding the Olympic Village of Whistler Canada. Capturing sledders hammering the throttle like never before creates an epic journey in this film. The record deep powder day riding are what dreams are made of. Pro riders slashing, whipping, climbing, dropping and crashing make this film inspirational to watch. Segments from Alaska and Sweden showcase unique riding skills from top name riders in the industry.  

Starring Ski-doo Summit Freeride Ambassador Dan Treadway who gets the films DVD cover shot with his powder free fall of incredible heights.  Also starring Geoff Kyle, Rob Alford, Rob Hoff, Cory Davis, Dan Phillips, KJ, Ross Mercer, Clayton Thomas, Rob Hoff, Kyle Armbrust, Tyler Blair, female sensation Ashley Chafffin and the famed Yukon Summit Savages. 

This Film was shot entirely in HD. Including amazing on board action captured from Go Pro camera systems. These shots give you the feel of riding with these pros. Edited to a diverse soundtrack. Running length +/- 45 minutes. Fun viewing for the entire family.

name: Special Edition FF Wrap! - Sled Wraps
description:
Get your whip looking tight. Sled wraps from Frontier Films.
Tired of the stock look. Order a sled wrap and stand out like the pros.
If you don't see what you want let us know and we can make it.
Includes free shipping anywhere in North America.

name: Frontier the 13th - ORDER NOW!
description: ANOTHER EPIC WINTER OF SLASHING POWDER, FREE FALLS, BACKCOUNTRY HITS, WHIPS AND RIPPING THROTTLE.   FRONTIER FILMS SPENDS THEIR THIRTEENTH WINTER STORM CHASING THE MOUNTAINOUS BIG FOOT COUNTRY IN SEARCH OF THE PERFECT SLEDDING TERRAIN.  FROM THE ROCKIES TO THE OUTREACHES OF THE YUKON TERRITORIES AND UP NORTH TO THE FAMED ALASKA.  ALL ALONG THE WAY SCANNING FOR BIG FOOT.  IT’S A CRAZY DRIVE TO DOCUMENT THESE FAMOUS ATHLETES WHO LIVE IN THE LAND OF SASQUATCH.  ON THE COVER KYLE ARMBRUST IS BACK AFTER 3 YEARS OF KNEE REHAB. HE IS ON MISSION TO RIDE. BIGFOOT SPOTTED.  OTHER RIPPING RIDERS INCLUDE, ROSS MERCER, RANDY SHERMAN, DAN PHILLIPS, GEOFF KYLE, DAN TREADWAY, THE CORMIER BROTHERES, RYAN BRITT, RYAN PHILLIPS, ROB ALFORD, CORY DAVIS, AND PAUL THACKER. PLUS THE ROOPS OF HAZARD CREW AND THE SUMMIT SAVAGE CANADIANS! OH YEAH AND ASHLEY CHAFFIN SHOWS THE BOYS A THING OR TWO.  LOOK FOR A FEW OTHER WELL KNOWN SLED FILM STARS ALONG WITH BIGFOOT CAPTURED ON FILM.  ALL SHOT IN HD AND EDITED TO  SOME FINE TUNES. FUN FOR THE ENTIRE FAMILY! +/- 60 MINUTES OF CONTENT.

name: 2SCS12 SNAFU***
description: 2 STROKE COLD SMOKE 12 takes you on another epic snowmobiling adventure around the WORLD. For the 12th film in the 2SCS Series, Frontier Films takes you thru the mountains of Canada's West, Alaska's North, Washington's deep and to far away places in the foreign countries of Sweden and Andorra. Starring: ROSS MERCER, GEOFF KYLE, ROB ALFORD, RANDY SHERMAN, DAN PHILLIPS, DAN TREADWAY, RYAN BRITT, 13 AND 15 YEAR OLD CORMIER BROTHER, PAUL THACKER, RYAN PHILLIPS, ASHLEY CHAFFIN, RYAN VAILLANCOURT, BRYN BATTERSBY AND MANY MORE TOP INDUSTRY RIDERS High Definition Cameras capture gigantic rock cliff free falls to submersible deep powder tactics. These professionals eat sleep and breath Big Mountain Freeriding! Double backflip attempts, Thackers World Record Distance jump, Crazy hill climbs, whips, freestyle and boondocking all take place in this film. What goes up must come down! Awesome crash segment too! Over 60 minutes of content. Fun for the whole family, especially anyone young at heart! CLICK HERE TO WATCH THE TEASER.

name: 2SCS - PACKAGE DEAL ***
description:
All four vids at one great price.
Get your snowmobile fix on this season with the collection:
2SCS9, 2SCS10, 2SCS11 and this year's 2SCS12.

name: 2SCS11 Gas Fed
description:
2 STROKE COLD SMOKE 11
The 11th film in the series. This is a must have. For 11 years Frontier Films has been working with some of the best sledders in the world. 2SCS11 is no exception!

Featuring Ross Mercer's new world distance record jump in Sweden! Canada to Alaska, the deepest powder descents, new surge of back flips, mountain freestyle, upside down whips and of course gnarly crashes that will give you the chills. At the end of the day, all the athletes agree on one thing "More Gas Please"

Sections from Sweden, Alaska, British Columbia, Yukon, Colorado and more discreet spots! Shot on Super 16mm Film and HD.

Two 35 minute Cold Smoke Chronicle Episodes. That's 70 minutes of action! Clean fun for the whole family!

Starring:
DAN PHILLIPS
CODY BORCHERS
GEOFF KYLE
ROB ALFORD
ROSS MERCER
RANDY SHERMAN
TOMMY FRANKSON
CORMIER BROS
JOE PARSONS
HEATH FRISBY
RYAN PHILLIPS
DAN TREADWAY 
AND MANY MORE

name: 2SCS10 - CRUSHIN IT
description: A Decade of making sled films, Frontier Films is still in it to pin it! Frontier Films is stoked to announce the release of ?2 Stroke Cold Smoke 10? with the sub title of ?Crushin It?. The new film compares to waking up on your day off with 2 feet of powder covering your sled! IT ROCKS. Watch it and you will be stoked to ride this winter! Featuring some of the worlds best riders; Rob Alford descending steep powder slopes turning through trees like a pro skier he once was except now he is on a sled. Geoff Kyle dropping cliffs and cornices into super deep powder its every sledders dream. Ross Mercer riding the mountains of the Yukon and hitting every jump in site nothing is too big for Ross since his record breaking 263.5 foot sled jump. Pro skier Dan Treadway as seen in Warren Miller films comes and films a segment with Frontier Films on his sled! With a 16mm Point of View film camera mounted on his back he drops into a huge powder descent which avalanches and buries him alive all caught on film! It will change who you ride with. Alaskan natives Randy Sherman and Dan Phillips jump bigger, drop further, ride deeper, whip larger than most really making this film exciting. This film has everything you want to see; Deeper than deep powder, Gigantic cliff drops, no handed backflips, Quinlan, Frisby, Burandt, avalanches, turbo sleds, hillclimbs, freestyle and jaw dropping crashesdid we mention the Sledclub girls in the intro??? With the perfect not to short not to long length of 46 minutes this film will keep you gripped. Great for the whole family. Also includes over 30 minutes of Bonus Features. Frontier Films is giving away to the first 500 internet orders one of their famous posters designed to go with the film. Finally to seal the deal C & A Pro skis inserted a coupon in the first 5000 dvds out the door. The coupons is for 25% off products direct through C&A Pro. Just watch Rob Alford?s section and you will see how good the C&A pro skis really are!

name: 2SCS9 - Niner
description:
2 Stroke Cold Smoke 9  
Hits, whips and clips are what this film is about. For the 9th year in a row Frontier Films releases another incredible sledding film. Innovation is the force behind this film. From long distance jumps to a new variation of the backflip this film packs it all in. It also showcases shots from the backcountry Redbull Fuel and Fury contest in Alaska where the best sledders in the world showed up to give it their all. Deep powder and big mountain cliff drops really round this film out. The athletes in this film search out the hits, ride their favorite whips and go big to get the clips! Starring; Ross Mercer, Christoph von Alvensleben, Kyle Armbrust, Randy Sherman, Cody Borchers, Geoff Kyle and many more of todays most talented sledders. This film is approximately 45 minutes long with 50 minutes of behind the scenes bonus footage! giving the viewer over 90 minutes of footage. Shot on 16mm film, digital video and even some High Definition Video for the highest quality film.

name: THC 8 - Smoke and Mirrors
description:
This film is dedicated to the snowmobiler that would rather ride a race sled over riding a production sled.  High Life Films would like to show a unique style of mountain riding.  The style is faster, smoother, and more of a snocross approach to riding, bringing ramp and show tricks as well as snocross sled skills into the backcountry and taking backcountry amplitude and style to shows and racing.  It might start at a backyard compound or trail riding in Michigan’s Upper Peninsula, the mountains of the North West, or the snocross tracks of the Midwest but the feeling of connecting to your sled like it is an extension of ones self it what ultimately drives our sport.  

Shot in the Chugach Mountains of Alaska, Colorado, Montana, and Washington.  Starring Joe Parsons, Corey Davis, Dane Ferguson, Daniel Bodin, and Jimmy Blaze.

name: The Snowhawk Addiction Season 3
description:
For the third consecutive year, the MccBrothers crew has set out to find and film some of hte steepest, deepest and sunniest rides the Western States have to offer. Join us while we take you through Washington, Idaho, Montana and Utah aboard our one ski snow machines. 

Approximately 30 mins. of one ski action, over a dozen guys rip up the 08-09 season, also exclusive Hawkfest footage where over 50 snowhawks and a half dozen sno bikes show up to throw down in the Mountains of Montana.
